name: Midtbo's Training
description:
As a climber, you should never skip finger training. You decided to follow the famous Midtbo's training.

Climb the highest. Do not wait for too long or you will get pumped. Do not miss the board.

Controls:
[SPACE] Grab a board

---
Made in 72hours for ScoreJam9
- Dyoxyne (Programming / Art) & Gizhaie (Programming) & Norjanen (Audio)
